      Parameters:

      void actionAppointmentByWeek(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      Parameters:
      event - Weekly radio button is selected

    • actionAppointmentShowAll

      void actionAppointmentShowAll(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      No filter on table, shows all appointments in database.
      Parameters:
      event - All Appointments radio button selected

    • actionBack

      void actionBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Goes back to main screen.
      Parameters:
      event - When the back button is clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - If it fails to load mainScreen.fxml

    • actionDeleteAppointment

      void actionDeleteAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the selected appointment with the given ID from the database and refreshes the appointment view table.
      Parameters:
      event - When the delete appointment button is clicked.

    • actionUpdateAppointment

      void actionUpdateAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Updates an existing appointment in the database with the information provided in the text fields. Validates the appointment fields to ensure business hours are not exceeded and appointments do not overlap. If the update is successful, the appointment list view is refreshed.
      Parameters:
      event - the clicking the 'Update Appointment' button

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the appointment view table and sets the cell value factories for each column.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL location of the FXML file.
      resourceBundle -
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an issue with the SQL statement or connection to the database

    • loadAppointment

      public void loadAppointment(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Populates boxes below the table with selected appointment information
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - When an appointment in the table is selected it loads.

    • checkForOverlappingAppointments

      private void checkForOverlappingAppointments(LocalDateTime dateTimeStart, LocalDateTime dateTimeEnd, int customerID, int newAppointmentID)
      Checks if there is any overlap between the start and end time of the new appointment and the existing appointments of a customer. If an overlap is found, shows an error message with the type of overlap detected.
      Parameters:
      dateTimeStart - The start time of the new appointment
      dateTimeEnd - The end time of the new appointment
      customerID - The ID of the customer for which the appointments are being checked
      newAppointmentID - The ID of the new appointment that is being added

    • validateAppointmentFields

      public void validateAppointmentFields()
      Validates the fields of an appointment Checks the start and end dates and times of the appointment against business hours and days, and ensures that all necessary fields are filled.
      Throws:
      common.showError - exception for invalid input
